desc: America's leading supplier of quality revolving shelving products. We carry the largest selection for quick door to door shipping. Rotabin Revolving Storage Bins are offered in various sizes for many different uses.

layout.text: The smallest Rotabin style is frequently found on workbenches and counter tops as well as mounted on the floor. Shelves have a welded-on hub with a one piece bottom. Curved shelf bottom makes it easy scoop and remove small parts. Available in 4 different shelf sizes. Capacity is 60 pounds per shelf.
